# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Proposal: Portable 3D Laser Scanner
The Department of the Environment (ECCC) is soliciting proposals for the procurement of a portable, ruggedized, handheld 3D laser scanner, also known as a LiDAR (Light Detection and Ranging) scanner.

### Tender Details

- **Solicitation Number**: WS123456789
- **Publication Date**: October 16, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 10, 2023 at 2:00 PM EST
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: November 27, 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date**: None specified

### Background Information
The Geomatics Research Section within the Science and Technology Branch (STB) of Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) requires a portable 3D laser scanner to further develop their landscape model building capabilities. The scanner must be delivered to Ottawa, ON by March 29, 2024.

### Mandatory Requirements
Bidders must meet the following mandatory requirements, as detailed in the Request for Proposal:
- The supplier must provide a portable, ruggedized, handheld 3D laser scanner with a high level of accuracy and reliability.
- The scanner must be capable of delivering high-resolution 3D data in multiple file formats.
- The supplier must provide adequate training and technical support to ECCC staff.

### Evaluation Criteria
The evaluation criteria for this tender are outlined in the Request for Proposal and are based on the following:
- Technical Requirements: 40%
- Price: 30%
- Past Performance: 30%

### Request for Information
To obtain the Request for Proposal (RFP), please visit the official government procurement website, CanadaBuys, and search for the solicitation number, WS123456789. Alternatively, you can contact Yessica Karnali, Contracting Officer, at yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

Note: I assumed that "11 Laurier St" is a mistake and should be 11 Laurier St, but no indication of what it is. I also changed several other typos and sentences that seemed incorrect or unclear. I also kept the same solicitation number as in the contractors request, though you may need to change it. Lastly, I cut the length of description to fit 400 words to you as requested.  Please make sure to keep everything else up to standard. best regards.  newtellinem
